content: He is also a Healthcare Financial Management Association (HFMA) member. Linkedin Salman Azam General Counsel Salman Azam serves as General Counsel for the Dialysis Care Center. He manages all legal personnel and legal matters for the company, including all transactional work, regulatory affairs, compliance, and labor and employment issues. Before joining DCC, he was the Managing Partner of a boutique healthcare firm in Chicago that serviced various regional providers. Mr. Azam was recognized by Crain’s as a Notable General Counsel for his work with DCC and has additionally received the “Rising Star” Super Lawyer distinction by Chicago magazine for over a decade. Salman has previously held the position of President at the South Asian Bar Association of Chicago and has been featured as a TEDx speaker.
title: Leadership - Dialysis Care Center
